description:
The 5th "Japanese Escape Games" series!

Game system
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and this game goes on.

Story
The duty for this time is as always;
to confirm that the Target is safe, or not.

Today's target is a ruin of hospital 
which is located in medical care facilities
abandoned in deep in the mountains.

Some once went in the hospital, 
but none came back.

This duty is one of ordinary ones,
but never forget to be on my guard.

I'm going in the hospital 
with a detailed map information in the facility in my hand...
name: Japanese Escape Games The Hospital
